Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
22.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
15.02.2012 JH SCR17062 Changed calls of GB500_OLD to the new GB500
28.04.2011 SH SCR16424 Replaced GB002 by GB902
20.10.2009 SH SCR14941 Added update CLNT698_LASTUPDATE
05.09.2006 SH SCR11799 Changed transaction handling
27.04.2006 SH SCR10813 Added test on GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID=210)
to skip writing of history if a new row is added (database trigger active then)
23.12.2004 SH SCR7516 Changed program structure to avoid LOCATE handling to
reposition the cursor on the row before button "Modify" was activated, see SCR
for more details
@INFO: LOCATE after coming back from changing amount has the effect that only
the first row will be shown in the tabular view, because of using CALLPROG() to
recalc MBTY_AMOUNTH, GNRL_CURRERNCY --> CLNT109_ATT_CURR, see also
SCR 7516 for more details.
MBTY_TYPE description in the language of the current user
MBTY_TYPE description in the system language
-- Dummy handler to avoid process of handler in OCA000 main program
Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit
